text: Mark Charnock (born 28 August 1968) is an English actor. ==Works== He is best known for portraying the role of Marlon Dingle in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale, which he has played continuously since 1996. This led him winning the National Television Awards in 2022. He and Emmerdale co-star Dominic Brunt, who plays Paddy Kirk, produce the annual Zombie Film Festival at the Leeds Cottage Road cinema. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Mark Charnock
